title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/ for the code to reproduce the issue. The current tests have limitations as they may produce false positives due to disabled filename checking in the harness verification of messages. In AJDT, if the filename doesn't make sense to AJDT, it is omitted.
OB: The source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main' in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars.
EB: Declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars should display the source path in the form 'app/Main'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars.
2. Notice that the source path appears as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
